info.title: G/L Account - Read
info.description: This service enables you to retrieve G/L accounts in chart of accounts and their names in the respective language.

x-sap-shortText: Read G/L account master data using this inbound service

values.text: SAP Analytics Cloud for Planning Integration(SAP_COM_0087)
Finance - Cloud Consolidation Data Collection Integration(SAP_COM_0241)
[Import Connection setup with SAP Analytics Cloud(1YB)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1YB " Link To BP ")
[Group Reporting - Data from SAP Group Reporting Data Collection(287)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/287 " Link To BP ")
[Enablement of SAP Excise Tax Management(4LO)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/4LO " Link To BP ")

tags.name: G/L Account in Chart of Accounts
G/L Account in Chart of Accounts Text

get.summary: Reads the items of all G/L accounts.
get.description: Reads the G/L accounts available in your system. Provides the information for all items with their properties defined in the chart of accounts view of the G/L account.
tags: G/L Account in Chart of Accounts

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads a G/L account by key.
get.description: Reads a selected G/L account item for the provided key.
tags: G/L Account in Chart of Accounts

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads the texts of a specific G/L account.
get.description: Reads texts and related fields from a specific G/L account.
tags: G/L Account in Chart of Accounts
G/L Account in Chart of Accounts Text

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads the texts of all G/L accounts.
get.description: Reads the texts and related fields from all G/L accounts. The related fields include the language and ID.
tags: G/L Account in Chart of Accounts Text

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads the texts of a specific G/L account for a specific language and account ID.
get.description: Reads the texts and related fields of a specific G/L account. The related fields include the language and account ID.
tags: G/L Account in Chart of Accounts Text

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads the specific G/L account related to the text item.
get.description: Reads the G/L account and its fields which is related to the specific text for language and ID.
tags: G/L Account in Chart of Accounts Text
G/L Account in Chart of Accounts

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$inlinecount](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=67) query option.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [Paging - Skip](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)
